name: Operation Gold Rush — $10.6B DME Fraud
description: 11 defendants indicted in multi-billion-dollar transnational DME fraud scheme — largest case by loss amount ever charged by DOJ

name: Kaiser Permanente MA Risk Adjustment — $556M Settlement
description: Kaiser Permanente affiliates pay $556M to resolve False Claims Act allegations of inflated Medicare Advantage risk adjustment diagnoses

name: Gehrke/King Wound Graft Fraud — $1.2B
description: Wound graft company owners sentenced for $1.2B health care fraud involving skin substitute products billed without medical necessity

name: Done Global Telehealth Adderall Mill — $100M
description: CEO and clinical president of digital health company convicted in $100M Adderall distribution and health care fraud scheme

name: Arizona Medicaid Behavioral Health Fraud — $650M
description: District of Arizona charges 7 defendants as part of national health care fraud takedown — $650M in behavioral health fraud targeting AHCCCS Medicaid

name: California Sham Hospice Network — $16M
description: Four California residents sentenced for $16M hospice fraud and money laundering scheme involving sham hospice companies

name: ACA Marketplace Enrollment Fraud — $21B GAO Finding
description: GAO report on ACA fraud risks — fictitious applicants approved for coverage and APTC subsidies worth billions

name: Teva Pharmaceuticals Copay Kickback — $450M
description: Teva Pharmaceuticals pays $450M to resolve kickback allegations involving copay assistance foundations
